FuncDef: The reset ipv6 nd security statistics command clears the statistics about SEND messages on an interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears the statistics about SEND messages on a specified the name of interface.
-

Clears the statistics about SEND messages on a specified the type and number of interface.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ipv6 nd security statistics GigabitEthernet 1/0/1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Running the reset ipv6 nd security statistics command will clear the statistics about SEND messages on a specified interface. Exercise caution when running this command.
